net.xqhs.util.logging

Class UnitComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xqhs.util.logging.Unit
      • net.xqhs.util.logging.UnitComponent

  • public final class UnitComponent
extends Unit
    A class that extends Unit and exposes the logging methods. See Unit for details.

    This allows a class to use the functionality of a Unit without extending the class.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

      • doExit

        public void doExit()
        Description copied from class: Unit
        Instructs the Unit to exit. This method is only accessible inside the instance, except if for good reasons an extending class makes it public.

        As the Unit layer only manages logging, the only thing that happens is that the log exists (if any).

        Overrides:
        doExit in class Unit
